thread.title: 5 things to know about Andrew Ferree
thread.title_full: 5 things to know about Andrew Ferree

title: 5 things to know about Andrew Ferree
text:
5 things to know about Andrew Ferree Rich McGowan , Reporter 9:27 p.m. EDT October 8, 2015 Buy Photo CONNECT 3 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Many high school athletes play their entire careers and not have a night like the one Andrew Ferree enjoyed three weeks ago. In Lakota’s 35-14 win over Montpelier in Week 4, the 5-foot-10, 200-pounder not only came up with a pair of interceptions, but he also took both of them back for touchdowns on returns of 44 and 65 yards. Ferree and the Raiders (3-3 overall) are two wins shy of their first .500 season since 2008 and are in contention for a postseason berth. Lakota will host Sandusky River League rival St. Mary Central Catholic Friday night. 
Q: What is your biggest pet peeve? 
AF: Losing. Just losing. I hate losing. 
Q: What’s your biggest fear? 
AF: Getting hurt and not being able to play. Not being there for my teammates to help them out. 
Q: If you could have any superpower, what would it be? 
AF: Strength, maybe. You can get some girls. 
Q: If I asked your parents what is your worst habit, what would they say? 
AF: Not cleaning. I don’t like to clean. My room is nasty. Clothes everywhere. 
Q: Plans for after graduation? 
AF: I plan on being a pipe fitter. Read or Share this story: http://ohne.ws/1RwUvCi TOP VIDEOS
